Row.Text: You have enhanced your pantheon by adding a new belief.
{1_CivName} {1: plural 1?has; 2?have;} enhanced their pantheon by adding a new belief.
An unknown civilization has enhanced their pantheon by adding a new belief.
Because you are at war with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}, they have revoked quests previously offered to you. The war must end before they will offer you quests again.
The birth of a {1_Resource:textkey} causes a Culture Boost in your Empire!
{1_CivName} and {2_CivName} have signed a Defensive Pact!
It has been many years since {1_CivDesc}'s promise to not settle near you. They consider that promise to be fulfilled.
{1_CivName:textkey} and {2_CivName:textkey} have [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]broken[ENDCOLOR] their public Declaration of Friendship, citing diplomatic tension as the cause.
Due to a new Declaration of Friendship with {1_CivName}, your cooperative war agreement with {2_CivName} has ended.
Due to a new Defensive Pact with {1_CivName}, your cooperative war agreement with {2_CivName} has ended.
Because {1_CivName} is no longer a valid war target, your cooperative war agreement with {2_CivName} has ended.
Because your friendship with {1_CivName} was prematurely terminated, your cooperative war agreements with them have ended.
Because {1_CivName} is no longer able to assist you in war, your cooperative war agreements with them have ended.
Because {1_CivName:textkey} was captured, your gifted {2_Unit} was returned to you.

The City of {2_City} is currently using more {1_Resource:textkey} than you have! Your Building [ICON_GOLD] Gold Maintenance will be increased by [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{3_num}%[ENDCOLOR] until you fix this problem!
{1_Civ} is no longer Allies with a civilization you're at war with. Peace with {1_Civ} is now possible again.
{2_Civ} bullied {1_CS}, reducing your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {1_CS} by {3_Influence}!
Your bullying of {1_CS} increased your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence by {2_Influence}, and reduced the [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence of other Civiliations by {3_Percent}%!
{3_Promotion} Status Effect inflicted on {1_Unit} to {2_Unit} during combat!
{3_Promotion} Status Effect was inflicted on our {2_Unit} by an enemy {1_Unit} during combat!
Our {2_Unit} was forced to retreat by an enemy {1_Unit}!
Our {1_Unit} forced an enemy {2_Unit} to retreat!
Your diplomats have learned that {1_PlayerName} paid {2_CivName} to make peace with you!
Your diplomats have learned that {1_PlayerName} paid {2_CivName} to make peace with {3_CivName}!
An unknown civilization staged a coup in {1_CityName}, ousted the {2_CivAdj} supporters, and installed their own supporters in the government to become the new ally of the city-state.
An unknown civilization attempted a coup in {1_CityName} but failed to overthrow the {2_CivAdj} supporters that have an alliance with the city-state.
{1_ReligionName} has become your new majority [ICON_RELIGION] Religion. This shift in religious status may affect your relationship with other Civilizations, as well as your own population.

{1_ReligionName} is now your primary [ICON_RELIGION] Religion. You alone will benefit from Founder and Enhancer Beliefs related to {1_ReligionName}, and any Founder or Enhancer Beliefs related to prior [ICON_RELIGION] Religions are no longer valid. All stored [ICON_PEACE] Faith is converted into [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points (except for Civilizations guaranteed a [ICON_RELIGION] Religion).

The Holy City of {1_CityName:textkey} was captured by {@2_CivName}! If {@2_CivName} is eligible, {3_Religion} may become their primary Religion, thus giving them access to its Founder and Enhancer Bonuses. If {3_Religion} was your primary Religion, you will lose access to its Beliefs until you retake it.

You captured the Holy City of {1_CityName:textkey}! If eligible, {2_Religion} may become your primary religion, thus giving you access to the Founder and Enhancer Belief bonuses associated with it (so long as you retain control of the City).

Citizens from the {2_Adj} City of {4_Dest} used your land Trade Route to visit the City of {3_Num}, and have spread word of your great City. As a result, you gained {1_Num} [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with {5_num}, and {6_num} [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism (before modifiers) with all other Civilizations they know!

Citizens from the {2_Adj} City of {4_Dest} used your sea Trade Route to visit the City of {3_Num}, and have spread word of your great City. As a result, you gained {1_Num} [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with {5_num}, and {6_num} [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism (before modifiers) with all other Civilizations they know!
Because your Civilization completed a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route with {2_Name}, your [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with all known Civs has increased by {1_Num} (before Tourism modifiers)!
Because your Civilization entered a new [ICON_RESEARCH] Era, your [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with all known Civs has increased by {1_Num} (before Tourism modifiers)!
Because your Civilization won a [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] War (Warscore of 25 or more), your [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with all known Civs has increased by {1_Num} (before Tourism modifiers)!
Because a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person was born in your Civilization, your [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with all known Civs has increased by {1_Num} (before Tourism modifiers)!
Because your Civilization constructed a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] World Wonder, your [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with all known Civs has increased by {1_Num} (before Tourism modifiers)!
Because your Civilization completed an [ICON_RES_ARTIFACTS] Archaeological Dig, your [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with all known Civs has increased by {1_Num} (before Tourism modifiers)!
Because your Civilization entered a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, your [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism with all known Civs has increased by {1_Num} (before Tourism modifiers)!
{1_Player:textkey} returned your captured {@2_UnitName} to you. How nice!
Your empire has entered a state of anarchy! This will last for {1_num} {1_num: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;}.
Our diplomats report that {2_Civ} recently bullied {1_CS}!

A beautiful princess of {@1_CivName} has been married off to a nobleman of {@2_MinorCivName}. With a diplomatic relationship united by marriage, your resting [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {@2_MinorCivName} is increased by 75, scaling with Era, and your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital's [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person rate is increased by 15%.

A handsome prince of {@1_CivName} has been married off to a noblewoman of {@2_MinorCivName}. With a diplomatic relationship united by marriage, your resting [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {@2_MinorCivName} is increased by 75, scaling with Era, and your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital's [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person rate is increased by 15%.

Your military status in the world and/or alliance and/or trade connection to {1_CSName} has been restored, thus your [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] to {1_CSName} is once again secure.

Your Military Advisor warns that the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you made to {1_CSName} is in danger of being annulled due to your weakening Military Power. Increase your Military Power by {3_Num}% within [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR] turns to maintain this promise!

Your Military Advisor warns that the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you made to {1_CSName} is in danger of being annulled due to distance. Ally {1_CSName} or make sure you are within Trade Route range within [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR] {2_Num: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;} to maintain this promise!

Your Military Advisor warns that the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you made to {1_CSName} is in danger of being annulled, both due to distance and your weakening Military Power. Ally {1_CSName} or make sure you are within Trade Route range AND increase your Military Power by {3_Num}% within [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR] {2_Num: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;} to maintain this promise!

If you do not improve your Military Power by {3_Num}% within {2_Num} {2_Num: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;}, the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you made to {1_CSName} will be annulled!

If you do not ally {1_CSName} or make sure your cities are within Trade Route range before {2_Num} {2_Num: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;} pass, the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you made to {1_CSName} will be annulled!

If you do not ally {1_CSName} or make sure your cities are within Trade Route range AND increase your Military Power by {3_Num}% before {2_Num} {2_Num: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;} pass, the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you made to {1_CSName} will be annulled!
Because one or both of you have no cities, {1_CSName} has annulled your [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] to them.

Because of {1_CSName}'s anger with you, they no longer value your [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] to them. As a result, your Pledge of Protection to {1_CSName} was [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]annulled[ENDCOLOR].

After due consideration and plenty of warnings, {1_CSName} believes that your military is no longer capable of fulfilling the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you promised. As a result, your Pledge of Protection to {1_CSName} was [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]annulled[ENDCOLOR].

After due consideration and plenty of warnings, {1_CSName} believes that long distances render you incapable of fulfilling the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you promised. As a result, your Pledge of Protection to {1_CSName} was [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]annulled[ENDCOLOR].

After due consideration and plenty of warnings, {1_CSName} believes that long distances and your weakening Military Power render you incapable of fulfilling the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pledge of Protection[ENDCOLOR] you promised. As a result, your Pledge of Protection to {1_CSName} was [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]annulled[ENDCOLOR].
{1_Civ:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} received rewards from Ancient Ruins: {@2_Reward}!
Converting a City to your [ICON_RELIGION] Religion:[NEWLINE]{1_YieldString}
Spreading your [ICON_RELIGION] Religion to a City:[NEWLINE]{1_YieldString}
Spreading your [ICON_RELIGION] Religion to a Foreign City:[NEWLINE]{1_YieldString}
Movement of a [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route in Foreign Territory:[NEWLINE]{1_YieldString}
Process in Destination City linked by [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route:[NEWLINE]{1_YieldString}
Gifting a Unit to a City-State:[NEWLINE]{1_YieldString}
+{1_Num} [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points in all Cities
{@2_CivName} is looking for new trade opportunities. They have heard of a distant city named "{@1_CityName}." If you are able to find the city of {@1_CityName}, you will be rewarded.
Your discovery of {@1_CityName} has greatly pleased the merchants of {@2_MinorCivName}.
Tactical experts from {@2_CivName} believe {@1_CityName} to be of significant strategic importance. Acquire it by any means, and you will be greatly rewarded!
The tactical experts from {@1_CivName} commend you for your efforts, and hope that the city is as militarily useful as they foresaw.
Tactical experts from {@2_CivName} believe that the city of {@1_CityName} is a significant threat to their safety. Conquer it by any means, and you will be greatly rewarded!
The tactical experts from {@1_CivName} thank you for conquering the city they targeted.
Intelligence reports from {@2_CivName} indicate that {@1_CityName} is ripe for a coup. Complete this coup, and you will be greatly rewarded!
{@2_Civname} commends you for your successful coup against {@1_CityName}.
Your coup has failed, either because your spy has died or {@1_City} is no longer a valid target. As such, the quest from {@2_Civname} was withdrawn.
Your coup has failed, either because your spy has died or the city is no longer a valid target. As such, the quest from {@1_Civname} was withdrawn.

Rogue agents in {@2_Civ} indicate that {@1_Civ} is currently quite vulnerable to espionage. If you complete a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spy Mission[ENDCOLOR] against {@1_Civ}, you will be greatly rewarded.
The rogue agents in {@2_Civ} are proud of your successful espionage efforts against {@1_Civ}!

Builders from {3_Civ} are eager to study the value of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Building}[ENDCOLOR]. {3_Civ} promises great reward if you construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR] of these buildings across non-puppet cities in your empire.
The builders from {@1_Civ} are dazzled by your monumental construction efforts.
Cartographers from {@1_Civ} request your help completing a mapmaking project. Explore the general vicinity of the indicated area as much as needed. They will reward you with what they have.
The cartographers from {@1_Civ} thank you for your assistance in their mapmaking project.
The mapmaking project from {1_Civ} has terminated early, as rumors abound that another civilization has claimed the uncharted lands as their own.

{1_CivName:textkey} was attacked by {3_TargetName:textkey}, and needs help. Receive the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]full[ENDCOLOR] Quest Reward from {1_TargetName:textkey} by [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]destroying[ENDCOLOR] {3_CivName:textkey}, or a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]partial[ENDCOLOR] Quest Reward through [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]allying[ENDCOLOR] both City-States. International pressure will force peace in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}[ENDCOLOR] {2_Num: plural 1?turn; other?turns;}, so act fast if you intend to intervene!
The war between {1_Civ} and {2_Civ} has ended with a white peace. The world breathes a sigh of relief knowing that the war did not escalate further.
The war between {1_Civ} and {2_Civ} has ended, thanks to your diplomatic efforts.
The war between {1_Civ} and {2_Civ} has ended, thanks to the diplomatic actions of {3_Civ}.
After waiting for a long time, the leaders of {2_MinorCivName:textkey} are no longer interested in the construction of {@1_WonderName} and have canceled the quest they had previously given to you.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT] [ICON_BULLET] {1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points in all Cities
{@1_PrjctName} was completed first in a far away land!
{2_ResourceName:textkey} is now available in {1_CityName:textkey}! [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production Cost reduced for:{3_Details}
You have declared war on {1_TeamName}! All allies or vassals of either side are also at war. {2_OurAllies} {3_TheirAllies}
Because of a Defensive Pact, {2_PlyrName} has joined {1_DefensivePactTeam} in the war against you! All allies or vassals of either side are also at war. {3_OurAllies} {4_TheirAllies}
You have declared war on {1_TeamName}! Your allies and vassals have also declared war. {2_OurAllies}
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_PlyrName} has declared war on you! All allies and vassals of either side are also at war.[ENDCOLOR] {2_OurAllies} {3_TheirAllies}
Because of a Defensive Pact, you have joined {1_DefensivePactTeam} in the war against {2_TeamName}! All allies and vassals of either side are also at war.[ENDCOLOR] {3_OurAllies} {4_TheirAllies}
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_PlyrName} has declared war on you! Your allies and vassals are also at war with {1_PlyrName}.[ENDCOLOR] {2_OurAllies}
{1_PlyrName} has declared war on {2_PlyrName}! All allies and vassals of either side are also at war. {3_FirstPlayerAllies} {4_SecondPlayerAllies}
Because of a Defensive Pact, {2_PlyrName} has joined you in the war against {1_PlyrName}! All allies and vassals of either side are also at war. {3_FirstPlayerAllies} {4_SecondPlayerAllies}

Because of a Defensive Pact, {3_PlyrName} has joined {1_DefensivePactTeam} in the war against {2_PlyrName}! All allies and vassals of either side are also at war. {4_FirstPlayerAllies} {5_SecondPlayerAllies}
{1_PlyrName} has declared war on {2_PlyrName}! The allies or vassals of {1_PlyrName} are also at war with {2_PlayerName}. {3_FirstPlayerAllies}
{1_PlyrName} has declared war on {2_PlyrName} and on their allies and vassals! {3_SecondPlayerAllies}
You have made peace with {1_TeamName}! All allies and vassals of either side have also made peace with each other. {2_OurAllies} {3_TheirAllies}
You have made peace with {1_TeamName}! Your allies and vassals have also made peace. {2_OurAllies}
{1_PlyrName} has made peace with {2_PlyrName}! All allies or vassals of either side have also made peace with each other. {3_FirstPlayerAllies} {4_SecondPlayerAllies}
{1_PlyrName} has made peace with {2_PlyrName}! The allies or vassals of {1_PlyrName} have also made peace. {3_FirstPlayerAllies}

Because your Empire has at least 20 [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness, a City will revolt in [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_Turns}[ENDCOLOR] {1_Turns: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;}. Based on current Unhappiness levels, the City most likely to revolt is {2_CityName}. If this City revolts, it will restore the sovereignty of {3_CivName}. Try to get your Empire's Happiness level out of this range as soon as possible!

Because your Empire has at least 20 [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness, a City will revolt in [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_Turns}[ENDCOLOR] {1_Turns: plural 1?Turn; other?Turns;}. Based on current Unhappiness levels, the City most likely to revolt is {2_CityName}. If this City revolts, it will become an independent City-State. Try to get your Empire's Happiness level out of this range as soon as possible!
A City has revolted and joined {3_CivName}!
The {1_CivAdjective} city of {2_CityName} has revolted and declared itself the free City-State of {3_CivName}!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} due to ideological divisions!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey}, citing concerns over warmongering!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} due to competition over City-States!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} due to the use of nuclear weapons!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey}, citing border disputes!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} out of respect towards the opinions of friends!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} due to their poor global reputation!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} due to a breakdown in foreign relations!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} as a result of archaeological theft!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} due to religious differences!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey} as a result of World Wonder competition!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey}, citing competition over global supremacy!
{1_CivName:textkey} {@1_CivName: plural 1?has; other?have;} publicly denounced {2_CivName:textkey}, stating that they are unforgiveable!
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} is constructing {4_WonderOrProject} in one of their cities.
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} has bought votes for the upcoming world congress session from {4_PlayerName}.
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} has sold some of their votes for the upcoming world congress session to {4_PlayerName}.
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} bribed {4_CivName} to go to war with you!
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} bribed {4_CivName} to go to war with {5_CivName}!
{1_PlayerName} has bribed {2_CivName} to go to war with {3_CivName}!
{1_CivName} and {2_CivName} are planning a war against you!
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} and {4_CivName} are preparing to go to war with you!
{1_CivName} and {2_CivName} are planning a war against {3_CivName}!
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that {3_PlayerName} and {4_CivName} are preparing to go to war with {5_CivName}!
The military might of {1_CivName} has risen strongly.
{1_SpyRank} {2_SpyName} discovered that the military might of {3_PlayerName} has risen strongly in recent times. They might be preparing for a war!
A Nuke has been detonated by {1_CivName} in the territory of {2_CIV}!
A Nuke has been detonated by {1_CivName} in neutral territory!
Defenses in {2_City} intercepted our Atomic Bomb, destroying it!
{TXT_KEY_GRAMMAR_UPPER_A_AN << {1_CIV}} Nuclear Missile was partially intercepted by {2_City}, reducing its damage done!
Defenses in {2_City} partially intercepted our Nuclear Missile, reducing its damage done!

Legends and folklore surrounding strange creatures and artifacts draw wise thinkers to your lands. Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_SCIENTIST] Great Scientist progress!

The tales of Scheherazade have inspired generations of your best authors. Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_WRITER] Great Writer progress!

Painters from around the world have come to your lands in order to depict scenes from Scheherazade's stories. Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST] Great Artist progress!

Scheherazade's poetry has led to a musical renaissance in your empire. Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_MUSICIAN] Great Musician progress!

Powerful and wealthy people flock to your court to listen to the tales of Scheherazade. Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_MERCHANT] Great Merchant progress!

Architects and engineers draw inspiration from the legendary heroes of Scheherazade's stories. Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_ENGINEER] Great Engineer progress!

Courtiers from around the world beg for an audience with you and Scheherazade. Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +{1_Num} to [ICON_DIPLOMAT] Great Diplomat progress!

Scheherazade's stories draw brilliant minds from around the world to your land. Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital gains +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +{1_Num} towards a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person!

Carnival has begun! All Cities will celebrate Carnival for {1_Num} turns, during which time [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Unhappiness from needs is reduced by 50% in addition to the normal 25% [ICON_FOOD] Growth bonus.
Your City gains +{1_Num} towards a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person!
New executive policies have been issued which benefit our economy. Your City gains +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_MERCHANT] Great Merchant progress!
New executive policies have been issued which benefit our industry. Your City gains +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_ENGINEER] Great Engineer progress!
New executive policies have been issued which benefit our research. Your City gains +{1_Num} to [ICON_GREAT_SCIENTIST] Great Scientist progress!
The birth of a {1_Unit:textkey} causes the city of {2_CityName:textkey} to enter "We Love the King Day"!
{1_CityName:textkey} has found us a military unit to serve!
Nomads from {2_CityName:textkey} have formed a unit of {1_Unit:textkey} ready to serve us.
Your soldiers found [ICON_RESEARCH] Science during the conquest of {1_Name}!
A virulent plague was spread from your {1_Unit} to their {2_Unit} during combat!
A virulent plague was spread to our {1_Unit} from their {2_Unit} during combat!
